content: the pattern is free to view in full on the blog through the link here on ravelry there is also an ad-free printable version available for purchase on etsy hope you like it loose cozy fabric and an oversized fit make this one of the comfiest sweaters ever this cardigan features minimal shaping and basic stitching there s a link to a helpful tutorial on how to knit cables if you ve never tried them materials us size 15 10 mm 36 circular knitting needles & straight needles optional 4 4 5 6 lion brand yarn color made easy bulky #5 yarn in kombucha 200 g/skein kit available here pattern uses approximately 650 g 758 g 876 g 1000 g cable needle scissors tapestry needle measuring tape sizes small medium large xl enjoy
